TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Time is relative, so if you don't have enough time to order than you will be escorted out of this establishment.

 

Waiter, there are some Pre .18 FL-T tanks in my soup.

You need to update.

Waiter, there is a video game forum in my soup!

...and it is properly served in the shell of an Atari 2600. What's the issue?

 

Waiter, I seem to be missing my spoon...

Have a fork

 

Waiter, there is a book full of assorted concept art in my soup.

Ooh, is that the lost river?

Waiter, there is a dragon in my soup!

It's a dragonfly soup. You should look better, there would be also a fly.

Waiter! What is it in the soup?

Your soup's time zone makes it so it's currently 7:47

Waiter, there's a Zeppelin in my soup!

It's a Led soup.

Waiter! Why the soup is pink?

Because you are color blind.

 

Waiter, there is a forum user celebrating five years of playing KSP in my soup.

Hmm, usually the cooks keep cannibal soup ingredients dead...

Waiter! The Normandy Landings are happening in my soup!

...*Gunshot* oh dear, I seem to have lost my head

waiter! the great and powerful leader of glopdose, dominator of the east arm of the milky way, destroyer of the zebras, leader of the first army of glopdose, is in my soup! and he seems to be swimming laps, oh by the way, he's half walrus

This is a primordial soup from the early Earth ocean. The leader/destroyer/dominator/etc is the biggest bacteria boiled in the kettle.
(And yes, genetically it's half ancestor of walrus.)

Waiter! Why there is a lobster in my trilobite soup?

Edited February 20, 2017 by kerbiloid

It was too hot and you let it sit for 500 million years to cool down.

Water! My soup is dry!

Sorry; someone dropped a sponge in there. However, due to our no refund policy, that'll be 15 bucks.

Waiter! Where's my soup?! I've been here an hour!

Time is relative. To us, you only ordered five minutes ago.

 

Waiter, there is a steel beam in my soup.

Don;t worry, sir. Titanic is very enduring ship.

Waiter! The soup listens to us!

Well we're sorry, but apparently some scientist has been experimenting with it. I'll take that...

Waiter! I've finished my soup; can I have another?

Why yes you can.

 

Waiter, can you please not redistribute my soup?

You sold the rights to the soup last week. To us.

Waiter, my soup is full of copyright infringement.

Thanks for ordering the NKS special

 

Waiter, there is originality in my soup.

We know, it's a new recipe. 

Waiter, there is a nuclear reactor in my soup!

Because we take the water from that lake near the old waste storage. It's already hot and tasty,
Jack, give him the fried three-eyed bull...frog instead.

Waiter! It's OK with this soup.

Wait a minute this isn't right... OMG! Kerbiloid! This soup is a Bomb!

Waiter! there J.C. Denton swiming in my soup!

You are mistaken, sir. That's D. B. Cooper.

Waiter! Why is the soup so slow in arriving at my table?

Because there were leaves on the line.

Waiter! There seems to be a ship in my soup...and it's gone...and it's back..?
